body:
Hi everyone 

I was away for 20 days and now I'm back! Avicore (I think that's what it is called) is really awesome, I especially love the website. I haven't got the chance to try Avicade and Nexus yet though I would like to. 

So I guess you can ask anything about me =)

title: I'm DragonCaper (AMA!)

replies.body:
Hey! Welcome!
What music do you listen to?
Would you rather be a fish or a horse and why?

replies.body: Humble Welcome to the Avicus Family! I am Ingigo, need any help, contact me on Skype which is on my profile

replies.body:
I listen to glitch hop and dubstep.  
Horse because they are a better animal overall. 

@ingigo Thanks but I don't think I need any =p
